H0.text: how many hoops are used in a game of croquet. 4

H1.text: how many hoops are used in a game of croquet. 8

H2.text: how many hoops are used in a game of croquet. 9

H3.text: how many hoops are used in a game of croquet. six

A4.text: The object of the game is to be the first to strike each of one's balls through all six hoops in both directions, in a fixed order, and to strike the central peg.
